extraction.title: Expose switch for cleanSession in UI
extraction.description: cleanSession currently defaults to a hardcoded False which, for most intents and purposes, is fine.We're experiencing issues with the app freezing up (no updates are displayed; map disappears) when too many QoS=1 pubs are seen by the app. Exposing a UI switch for CleanSession = True/False would allow users to select the behaviour.
